page.title: 02THE HEATHER HUT IN EDDERTON
page.content: One of the unusual features of Edderton is{The Heather Hut.}The hut was first built by the local people in 1921.A collection had taken place in order to build a memorial to the people of Edderton who had been killed during the First World War.When they had completed the memorial,they had some money left over,so it was decided that it would be used to build a shelter for the people to sit in during thier free time.It was built of wood and had a thatched heather roof.Years later it was accidently burned as were its two replacements.We are now in the process of making the fourth{Heather Hut}using wood and ,of course, heather.We hope we will soon be able to say we have an attractive feature, made by the local people using the local material,of which we can be very proud.
